overview:
Greg is an active entrepreneur focused on making a difference in his community through software solutions that help others grow and provide services to their fellow mankind.

Greg has over 25 years of technology experience from working with the Space Station to working at Nike. He has participated in several startup companies such as GemStone and Klockwork and has successfully contributed to those companies utilizing different hats.

With an extensive track record in Startups and Consulting, Greg developed the need to provide services in an area that has not been fully explored to date. That is in the area of Business Oriented Networking efforts where there would be a service fee to participate.

Greg’s initiative and perseverance will ensure that he will map out a solution that will meet the needs of his customers.
